name: Captain Fartipants
description:
The fewer Fart Blasts you use, the higher your score. You can complete a level by scoring 1, 2, or 3 STARS. Three stars being the highest and most fartastic score!
But beware, use too many Fart Blasts, and you will Poop Out!
Fart Blasts will move Captain Fartipants. So, to generate a blast, just touch any place on the screen. The distance and the angle of the Fart Blast will determine how and where the Captain moves.
there are 60 levels each level you complete will unlock the next level. You can go to the Level Select Screen at any time. From there you can select any unlocked level to retry and improve your Star Poop Rating.
Watch out for the air freshener sprays, toilet rolls, pooping cats, pooping geese, and more. And don’t slip on a pile of poop, unless you can use it to slide in the right direction!
